page.title: 13AT HOME IN SOUTH REIGATE
page.content: Using children of St.Luke's Middle School as a sample of families in the Southpark section of our block,the fol -lowing conclusions may be drawn. The majority belong to happy,two par- ent families,though a sizeable minor- ity belong to one parent families or broken homes.Accommodation ranges from three bedroom terraced to four bedroom detached shared about equally between owner-occupier and council rented. Most households are well equipped with modern facilities such as TV's,videos, hi-fi's and labour-saving kitchen e- quipment.Many have computers,most have cars. Many belong to clubs and collect.They like living near to the countryside a- nd find their environment pleasant ex- cept for dog and litter pollution.Fam- ilies often visit public spaces or at- tend recreation centres in other towns
